website_summaries.verdict: Useful features, reliable performance, and a fit that is suitable for most make this respirator worth considering despite a few quirks.
pros: Provides a comfortable fit that works well for the majority of users
Does a great job filtering out fumes, so it's a good choice for painters
cons: A few respirators didn't work properly
Replacement filters can be difficult to find

customer_reviews.title: Protection while working with epoxy product refinishing bathtub
customer_reviews.text: I am a reluctant mask wearer, but this mask was comfortable and made the extended exposure to a high VOC epoxy product (Rustoleum Tube & Tile kit) safe and tolerable. I used the mask to do two refinishing jobs in small spaces where fumes were very strong. With the mask on, the fumes were mild at worst and provided a safety. I highly recommend this mask with the VOC filter cartidges. It was a good value and a must for the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the paint job in my house. Rather spend a few extra dollars get these than those disposal ones. Somehow I just think these are better. They’re not disposable I guess. I just used it yesterday. Works great. No problem with breathing. Not heavy. I had another one before which feels like it keeps falling off my face. It does has a little rubber/silicone smell when I first open it. But that’s gone. Anyway all for all it’s a pretty nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't smell the odor.
customer_reviews.text: It kept me from smelling the odor. Only complaint is that the charcoal holders would occasionally fall off, when I adjusted the respirator on my face. But I may not have put holders on respirator correctly????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son because he spray paints model cars and the fumes are very strong. This works great and he said he can't smell the fumes at all when he's using this.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Replacement filter cartridge are currently not available
customer_reviews.text: Just received my mask and wanted to order some replacement filters and after finding asin:b07gb1f3j9 it seems that it is a LDT-3 filter cartridge that amazon states "we don't know when or if this item will be back in stock". While it seems comfortable and light weight I gave overall rating and value for money only 2 stars because of not being able to and may never be able to get replacement filters, it may be useful for only a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: used it for intense painting and spray paining projects which had left me super sick without a mask. With this mask, I was more than fine. Love it
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask
customer_reviews.text: Mask works great. There is a hard plastic piece that your chin sits on and can get uncomfortable after 20 minutes. Other than that, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to go on the plastic around the fees should be a little bit more like rubber but aside from that it works very well I would give it a nine out of 10 it’s definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: David Ponte

customer_reviews.title: No Air coming in from any other place except the filters!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice for protection and it seals Great!! No Air coming in from any other place except the filters!!
customer_reviews.author: Vic D

customer_reviews.title: This is especially good
customer_reviews.text: This gas mask is especially easy to use. The quality is also very good. The design is very reasonable. After the belt, I can’t smell the smell.
customer_reviews.author: vicky chu

customer_reviews.title: Dont have it on over 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Mask is too heavy and becomes very uncomfortable after wearing a half hour cut into the ridge of my nose and is not to be worn while tempature is hot
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the the ease, lite wt. Of mask;I leak tested the mask ,passed. Will use mainly for painting, haven't used yet, happy so far, will need filters in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality safety device
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried about the quality given the low price, but the filters work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond N.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for welding!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for welding! It lets me breathe in clean air free of welding particles
customer_reviews.author: Caro V

customer_reviews.title: workshop
customer_reviews.text: works well in keeping the sawdust from entering the lungs
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Pest control respirator
customer_reviews.text: Easy on easy off . Easy to store . Overall a great product .
customer_reviews.author: Michael  A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust straps for, your personal fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just what i was looking for. Thank you, recommended
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy but works for small duration of spray painting
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfortable respirator by any means but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

product_meta.title: Half Face Reusable Respirator Spray Paint Gas Mask Respiratory Protection Multi-Purpose Respirator,Medium(Mask+1 Pair Cartridges)
feature_bullets: 【HIGH QUALITY】- Made of superior quality silica gel.Soft, comfortable, durable, non-toxic and safe.
【FIT COMFORTABLE】 – Lightweight with adjustable straps.The design minimize the need to fix and adjust while working.
【PROFESSIONAL EFFICIENT FILTRATION SYSTEM】 – Durable exhalation&inhalation valve to effectively filter toxic gases, vapors and ensure smooth breathing.Filter level:P95.

【DUAL PROTECTION】 - Dual cartridges design offer you an effective protection against organic vapors.Filter cottons for oily and non-oily particles the filter efficiency is more than 95%.Easy to breathe,and easy clean.

【MULTI-SCENE USE】– Multi-purpose respirator assembly works in a variety of workplace applications. Protect against all kind of organic gases and vapors, chlorine benzene, alcohols, and carbon dioxide, etc. The respirator mask is widely used in paint, chemicals, polish, pesticides spraying, chemical experiments, oil extraction, mining and metallurgy, or welding,etc.If you want to order more cartridges,please search ASIN:B07GB1F3J9.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
